title: S3 Ep110: The One In Phase 2!: Monday, June 22nd, 2020
itunes:title: The One In Phase 2!: Monday, June 22nd, 2020
description:
• Gabrielle Union's 'Self' Magazine Cover Shoot Was Photographed by Zaya Wade: I'm 'Beyond Proud' (US Magazine)
  • Ansel Elgort Denies Sexual Assault Allegation: 'I Have Never and Would Never Assault Anyone' (PEOPLE)
  • Justin Bieber Refutes Sexual Assault Allegation: 'Sexual Abuse Is Something I Don't Take Lightly' (PEOPLE)
  • Live Nation Sets Drive-In Concert Amid Pandemic (The Hollywood Reporter)
  • 'Mamma Mia' Producer Teases Third Film, Says It's 'Meant to Be a Triology' (Variety)
Open Book by Jessica Simpson Recap
The Chiffon Trenches by André Leon Talley Recap
We're Gonna Need More Wine: Stories That Are Funny, Complicated, and True by Gabrielle Union Recap
Just Mercy Recap
Toast Movie of The Week: BlacKkKlansman

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoproblems)
